description: A simple leather cloak, richly decorated with scales of gilded iron and several feathers.  It resembles the hide of a golden dragon or serpent.  Using it will heal minor injuries, in exchange for inflicting pain.
//: A reusable healing item that's also armored?  Yeah, that's staying valuable for a while.

description: A mask faced with iron and decorated with other metal, depicting the face of some unknown divine figure.  Fueling it with consecrated essence will grant the wearer clairvoyance within a limited range and protection from bright flashes, but blind you to anything beyond its effect.

use_action.msg: The mask appears to contort into a fearsome visage, the eyeholes momentarily seeming to glow as a strange perception replaces your natural vision.
use_action.need_charges_msg: Fuel the mask with consecrated essence, to open your eyes.

description: A mask faced with iron and decorated with other metal, depicting the face of some unknown divine figure.  The face depicted on the mask seems more menacing than it did previously.

use_action.msg: The mask's features return to its original impassive expression.

description: A set of well-decorated leather armor, with serpentine patterns sewn into it, various adjustable straps added.  Using it will conjure a long-lasting spray of acid.

A wicked-looking crown made of precious metal, decorated with scenes of skeletons in a "danse macabre" motif.  A single brilliant gem adorns it, in the center of the scene depicted.  Using it shall yield immunity to food poisoning and parasites, in exchange for increased hunger.  It will not cure existing ailments, only prevent them.

use_action.activation_message: The gem shimmers with malevolent red light as you feel a strange hunger, a craving for rotting meat and stagnant water...

//: misc properties were mostly made by averaging the values of all possible types of robe usable to make it
description: A loose-fitting robe of some sort, heavily altered with decorations resting on the shoulders, dyed in a simple dark gray.  Using it will grant invisibility and soften footsteps, draining essence quickly.

use_action.msg: The robe's fabric darkens to a rich shade of black, cloaking your surroundings in a flickering illusion.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The mantle requires essence to bring forth the night.

description: A loose-fitting robe of some sort, heavily altered with decorations resting on the shoulders.  The air wavers around it, barely noticeable to you.
revert_msg: The robe's fabric returns to its normal gray color, dispelling the illusion.

use_action.msg: The robe's fabric returns to its normal gray color, dispelling the illusion.

description: A heavy set of plate gauntlets, decorated with silver around the edges of each individual plate.  Touching the bare metal sends a faint electric tingle through you.  Use them to give a nearby enemy a powerful stunning jolt.

//: Requires an item that did not exist pre-cataclysm to make.

use_action.msg: A brilliant radiance pierces through the mantle from the gorget, until your body is shrouded in a strange glow.
use_action.need_charges_msg: This requires dull essence to invoke.

description: A set of mail armor with a mantle made from a gilded aegis draped over it, splints of copper worked into the arms and sides.  Underneath the mantle is a gorget of copper, with otherworldly green stones set into it.  An aura of protective magic is radiating from it, granting immunity to fire, blade, and bullet, along with resistance to other environmental hazards.

use_action.msg: The glow emanating from your jade hauberk fades.

description: A crown of dark green stone with strange geometric patterns carved into it.  Wearing it will drain heat from fires, but it will also starve your body.  Invoking it will harden the body against heat, though immersion in flame will still harm you.
//: The shrine lesser artifacts are all pre-cataclysm items.
Slightly more efficient in essence-equivalent than fang, as heat resistance is less comprehensive.

use_action.activation_message: The carvings in the stone glow red for a brief moment, and a chill passes through your spine.

description: An ornate necklace with a small charm resembling a round shield, made from a hard iridescent metal.  Wearing and activating it will ward against electricity, but also slow the body.

use_action.msg: As you activate the talisman, you feel insulated in a strange manner.
use_action.need_charges_msg: The charm against lightning needs purified essence to function.

description: An ornate necklace with a small charm resembling a round shield, made from a hard iridescent metal.  A strange electric tingle permeates the air around it, hinting at its protective magic.  It grants immunity to lightning.

use_action.msg: The glow fades from the meteoric talisman, its protective magic fading with it.

description: A simple silver ring, adorned with a small red gem and a wing motif.  Using it cures several anomalous ailments, and provides protection from such effects for a while.
//: While unassuming, those who knew what rituals it was useful for would value it highly.  Those people are probably now dead.

use_action.activation_message: A strange energy radiates from the ring's gem, spreading a calming sensation over you.
